title: Liverpool transfer rumours: Riyad Mahrez to snub Jurgen Klopp
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British press on Friday, January 12.
content: Riyad Mahrez would prefer a move to Arsenal over Liverpool, according to the Daily Express.The Leicester winger has emerged as a possible replacement for Alexis Sanchez at the Emirates or Philippe Coutinho at Liverpool.Liverpool are preparing to battle a host of Premier League clubs for the signature of Norwich midfielder James Maddison, according to reports.The Mirror report that Jurgen Klopp's men are among a group of suitors for the Canaries starlet, with Tottenham and Southampton also interested.Liverpool are ready to sell striker Daniel Sturridge for £30m after he asks to quit Anfield, according to the Daily Mail.Sturridge has fallen down the pecking order at Anfield under Klopp and is looking to move to reignite his career.Liverpool defender Virgil van Dijk insists the £75m price tag is a big compliment to his hard work, and does not make him nervous.He told Sky Sports: "It doesn't make me nervous, it's a big compliment to myself for the hard work I've put in so far, that Liverpool are willing to pay that much money. I can't change anything about that."
